logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (377091) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

Seizure disorder, epileptic seizure added. Excludes eclampsia, convulsions of new born and complications of pregnancy, childbirth and puerperium.
